com.esri.mo2.map.elt
Class LegendItem

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.elt.LegendItem
public class LegendItem
extends Object

A LegendItem class is corresponding to one type of features in the map. A LegendItem is to specify the feature by a symbol and a label description in a LegendElement.
